com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory

Class ShopItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory.InventoryItem
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory.ShopItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShopSpell

    public class ShopItem
extends InventoryItem
    An item used in an inventory menu. This is composed of an actual item stack, a display item type, and the cost and fame requirement of the item.

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplay

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplay(QuestPlayer player)
        Returns the item that should be used to display the item to the given player. This method formats the lore, etc to display correctly (and with correct colors) to the provided player given their fame and money. If the passed player is null, the item without lore is returned.
        Specified by:
        getDisplay in class InventoryItem
